name: Asparagus officinalis
Relationship: Compare: Althaea - Marshmallow - (contains asparagine; irritable bladder, throat and bronchi.) Physalis Alkekengi. Digital.; Sarsap.; SpigeliaAntidote: Acon.; Apis.

Heart: Pulse intermits, weak, pain about left shoulder and heart, associated with bladder disturbances
Head: Migrainous morning headache with scotoma
Aching in forehead and root of nose
Throat feels rough, with hawking copious, tenacious mucus from throat
Confused
Coryza, with profuse, thin fluid
Urine: Frequent, with fine stitches in orifice of urethra; burning; of peculiar odor
Cystitis, with pus, mucus and tenesmus
Extremities: Pain at acromion process of left scapula under clavicle and down arm, with feeble pulse
Rheumatic pain in back, especially near shoulder and limbs

details: Its marked and immediate action on the urinary secretion is well known. It causes weakness and cardia depression with dropsy. Rheumatic pains. Especially about left shoulder and heart.
